metadata.name: Potential PsExec Remote Execution
metadata.comment: Detects potential psexec command that initiate execution on a remote systems via common commandline flags used by the utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('accepteula')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' \\\\')))

output.summary: Detects potential psexec command that initiate execution on a remote systems via common commandline flags used by the utility
